column4: Can you help me with this driver problem on my MSI VR630 laptop
not unless you tell me your problem!
Here is the problem,
I have an MSI VR630 laptop I installed ubuntu Jaunty Jackelope
what does 'doesn't boot' mean?
and remeber not to press the enter key so often.
I didn't press enter or anything
can you boot in rescue mode with a VESA driver?
No
I tried opensolaris, all kinds of linux, solaris nothing works
However, ubuntu installed
do a sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg and select VESA driver.
I have an AMD sempron
nobody cares. Your card might just be broken...
No
Stupid windows works just fine
yeah it might, but that's not our primary mission :-) Just don't use the proprietary nvidia  driver :P
what is not the primary mission
to make it just work. The mission is to create a free Operating System. Free as in Speech, not in Beer.
I don't have any probelem with free or paidm I just need get the damn thing to work
Yeah, you apparently don't get it. It's not about paying. It's about freedom.
